snippet.title: MechWarrior 5: Clans New Gameplay and Digital Collectors Edition
snippet.description:
Greetings Warriors,

We're excited to bring you new footage and new Details about MechWarrior 5: Clans! We can’t wait for you to experience it!



DIGITAL COLLECTERS EDITION
Includes  MechWarrior 5: Clans - Base Game PLUS Exclusive in-game content:
 - 70-Page Digital Artbook (With continued updates post launch)
 - 36-Song Digital Soundtrack
 - Omnimech Technical Readout (With continued updates post launch)
 - Platinum Mech Patterns For all Chassis
 - A Timber Wolf WAR Omnimech with Unique Weapon Loadout and Skin


In MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS, you assume the role of a young pilot freshly graduated from training on Huntress, the Smoke Jaguar homeworld. As a vital member of a five-mech squad, known as a "Star," you find yourself thrust into the heart of the Clan Invasion of the Inner Sphere.

MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS is a new standalone game made in Unreal Engine 5 that delivers a story-driven campaign with over 90 minutes of cinematics.

Experience challenging and immersive missions on multiple worlds.
Pilot your Omnimech with streamlined Mech controls
Command your Star with the intuitive Command Wheel, and dynamic Battlegrid.
All new CLAN-themed metagame, Mechlab, and Pilot Progression.
Playable with 1 to 5 Players with Cross-play Co-op on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC 
Releasing October 17th, 2024.
